name: Chocolate Whoopie Pie Cookies Filled With Spicy Chile Chocolate Caramel
description: Chocolate whoopie pie cookies filled with spicy chile chocolate caramel. A delicious sweet treat, Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 2/3  + cup self rising flour Or all purpose flour + 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
3 Tablespoons Theoâ€™s chipotle spicy chile dark chocolate  melted
2 Tablespoons Theos spicy chile chocolate pieces

itemListElement.text: In a pan, add hot water and flax meal. Mix and let sit for a minute.
itemListElement.name: In a pan, add hot water and flax meal. Mix and let sit for a minute.

itemListElement.text: Add in the oils, orange juice, agave, sugar, salt, spices, cocoa powder and chocolate. Mix everything vigorously. If the chocolate is not well melted, microwave the mix for a few seconds and mix well.
itemListElement.name: Add in the oils, orange juice, agave, sugar, salt, spices, cocoa powder and chocolate. Mix everything vigorously. If the chocolate is not well melted, microwave the mix for a few seconds and mix well.

itemListElement.text: Add in the flours and mix till just about combined. Add more or less flour to get a doughy batter thicker than a muffin batter but not a stiff dough.
itemListElement.name: Add in the flours and mix till just about combined. Add more or less flour to get a doughy batter thicker than a muffin batter but not a stiff dough.

itemListElement.text: Using a scoop, drop the batter onto the parchment lined sheet. Press and shape with oiled hands.
itemListElement.name: Using a scoop, drop the batter onto the parchment lined sheet. Press and shape with oiled hands.

itemListElement.text: Bake at preheated 350 degrees F for 12-14 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Bake at preheated 350 degrees F for 12-14 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Cool on rack for 5 minutes before applying caramel.
itemListElement.name: Cool on rack for 5 minutes before applying caramel.

itemListElement.text: In a pan, add water, coconut oil and sugar and heat on medium heat. Stir continuously, till the sugar syrup darkens and thickens to desired consistency. 5-7 minutes.
itemListElement.name: In a pan, add water, coconut oil and sugar and heat on medium heat. Stir continuously, till the sugar syrup darkens and thickens to desired consistency. 5-7 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Add in the chocolate and mix. If the syrup has become too thick, add in coconut milk 1 Tablespoon at a time, to get a creamy filling.
itemListElement.name: Add in the chocolate and mix. If the syrup has become too thick, add in coconut milk 1 Tablespoon at a time, to get a creamy filling.

itemListElement.text: Take off heat and immediately fill the cookies and stick them together.
itemListElement.name: Take off heat and immediately fill the cookies and stick them together.

itemListElement.text: Wait for a few minutes for the caramel to harden and cool.. eat:)
itemListElement.name: Wait for a few minutes for the caramel to harden and cool.. eat:)

keywords: chocolate cookies, filled cookies, vegan cookies
